tags: Hampe de drapeau, pièces ou accessoires
full_summary:
### Gold Square Spear Top Finials Tender
#### Reference Number: WS4438277266-Doc4442161979

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Bid Submission Deadline:** February 28, 2024, 14:00 EST (local time)
**Contact Information:**
Zeljka Omerzo, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Email: [zeljka.omerzo@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:zeljka.omerzo@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Procurement Overview:** 
Public Works & Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of six hundred (600) gold (brass plated zinc-alum alloy) square spear top finials. The goods will be used for official events and conferences.

**Key Information:**

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   End User: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Regions of Delivery: Canada

**Additional Requirements:**
*   Deliverables must be received on or before March 26, 2024.
*   Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time have been modified; all amendments superseding the notice must be evaluated against the published notice.
*   All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 28, 2024, at 14:00 EST.
*   Bids submitted after 14:00 EST on February 28, 2024, will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

**Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18782666?extsite=MTg3ODI2NjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18782666?extsite=MTg3ODI2NjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) 

**This tender is subject to applicable trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).**

Limitations in the provided document (headings, etc.) that I worked around:
- Unreadable formatting
- Rare lack of description for setting supply and delivery location or clarification (added processing for various notes for sometime location
